Class Plot

All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public abstract class Plot
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Abstract class for displayed plots.

Since:
JDK 1.1
Version:
0.5
Author:
Ken Swartz
See Also:
Plot1d, Plot2d, Serialized Form

setHistogram

public void setHistogram(Histogram hist)
Set current histogram, doing nothing else--this is a hack to let scroll bars work.

displayHistogram

public void displayHistogram(Histogram hist)
Set the histogram to plot. If the plot limits are null, make one save all neccessary histogram parameters to local variables. Allows general use of data set.

public abstract void displayGate(Gate gate)
                          throws DataException
Displays a gate on the plot.

Parameters:
gate - the gate to be displayed
Throws:
DataException - thrown if there is an unrecoverable errer accessing the Gate
